summary:
• Capital Change Notice: Grant of 3,059,190 options (10.6% of total options on issue) under Oceania Healthcare Share Option Plan.
  • Exercise Price: NZD $0.65 (VWAP for 5 trading days prior to 26 May 2025).
  • Vesting/Exercise Period: Begins 10 business days after 2028 final results announcement, ends 90 days later.
  • Settlement: Cashless (net settled) exercise; shares issued based on market value minus exercise price.
  • Reason for Issue: Employee retention, performance alignment, and long-term incentive for CEO/selected staff.
  • Total Options Outstanding: 31,677,802 post-issue.
  • Issue Date: 23 June 2025.

Omitted non-material details (contact info, boilerplate).

Spark Divestment Announcement Summary:
- Asset Sold: 10% stake in Hutchison Telecommunications (Australia) Limited (HTAL)
- Buyer: Hutchison Telecommunications (Amsterdam) BV (CK Hutchinson Holdings subsidiary)
- Sale Price: A$0.032/share (45% premium to independent valuation upper bound, 39% premium to 3-month VWAP)
- Proceeds: NZ$47m (expected July 2025), to be used for net debt reduction
- Strategic Rationale: Aligns with Spark’s review of non-core assets.

Note: No material timetables, capital structure changes, or trading impacts beyond the above.

• Takeover Announcement: Shift4 Payments (NYSE-listed) to acquire Smartpay Holdings Limited at NZ$1.20 per share via scheme of arrangement.
  • Offer Premium: 46.5% premium to 90-day VWAP (NZ$0.82/share as of 20 June 2025).
  • Implied Valuation: Equity value NZ$296.4m (A$274.1m); EV NZ$305.8m (14.2x FY25 EBITDA).
  • Key Conditions: Shareholder approval (75% votes cast + >50% shares voted), NZ High Court approval, Overseas Investment Act consent, no Material Adverse Change.
  • Timetable: Shareholder meeting Q3 2025; expected implementation Q4 2025.
  • Support: Unanimous board recommendation (subject to independent advisor’s valuation) and 13.3% shareholder Microequities Asset Management backing.
  • Exclusivity: No-shop/no-talk provisions; NZ$2.96m break fee each way.

No material operational/financial updates disclosed.

• Drilling commencement: Diamond core drilling started at Bousquet Gold Project (Canada) with approvals for up to 38 drillholes (10,000m).
  • Phase 1 program: 2,400m targeting high-grade Paquin Prospect (9m @ 16.96g/t Au) and Decoeur Prospect.
  • Location: Project situated on Cadillac Break, a regionally significant gold structure (>110Moz Au).

No material trading/capital markets impact identified (operational update only).
